nodes.text: Varé Malago was a male individual who resided on the desert planet Jakku. While walking through the Starship Graveyard, Malago unknowingly stepped on the loose end of some TIE/sa bomber power trunking, which had been buried under the desert sand. The incident caused Malago to catch fire, and he died.

The scavenger Rey witnessed the event, and she deduced that the solar panels of the TIE wreckage had still been collecting power, which had led to Malago's death. Rey recorded the accident in her survival guide.
Varé Malago was first mentioned in the book Rey's Survival Guide, which was written by Jason Fry and published in 2015.
